title: Bajaj Auto reports 20 pc decline in vehicle sales in March
description: For the full fiscal 2021-22, Bajaj Auto registered a growth of 8 per cent in its vehicle sales at 43,08,433 units. In the year-ago period, the sales stood at 39,72,914 units.
